meanings.sent1: The nonretractile claws of the crab remained extended.
meanings.sent2: The nonretractile antenna of the insect stayed out.
meanings.sent3: The nonretractile measuring tape couldn't be rolled back up.
meanings.sent4: Her nonretractile decision to quit her job surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The nonretractile gate stood firmly in place, blocking the path.

meanings.definition: Not able to be drawn back or pulled in.
meanings.sent1: The nonretractile leash kept the dog close by.
meanings.sent2: The nonretractile curtains remained open all day.
meanings.sent3: The nonretractile straw in the drink made sipping difficult.
meanings.sent4: His nonretractile attention was fixed on the screen.
meanings.sent5: The nonretractile seatbelt held him securely in place during the bumpy ride.

meanings.definition: Unable to be withdrawn or taken back.
meanings.sent1: The nonretractile promise could not be undone.
meanings.sent2: The nonretractile statement was already out in the open.
meanings.sent3: The nonretractile invitation had already been sent out.
meanings.sent4: Her nonretractile confession left her feeling vulnerable.
meanings.sent5: The nonretractile decision to move abroad was final and irrevocable.
